"Partner's Friendship Level":
"Partner's Friendship Level


If you clear a quest
with a partner character,
or if you complete
one of their client orders,
That character's Friendship Level will go up.

Your partner's Friendship Level can be found in the Campship
from the \"Partner Terminal\"
from the \"Partner List\".
"

"As your partner's Friendship Level goes up
the \"Present Gauge\" will also go up.

When that \"Present Gauge\" maxes out
That character will give you
their present.

A \"present icon\" will show above the partner's head.

A \"present icon\" is shown beside \"Talk\".
Press \"Talk\"
to get the present."
